description: A MemberActive trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that a member port for one of the
link aggregation groups has moved from inactive state to active
state. This indicates that the system may choose this port when
sending data out of the link aggregation group.

event.Summary: Link aggregation group member port $v3 is active

description: The interface index of the link aggregation group in the
variables.name: NOKIA-IPSO-LINKAGGREGATION-MIB::ipsoLAGroupIfIndex

description: The interface index of the member port in the MIB-II interfaces table.
variables.name: NOKIA-IPSO-LINKAGGREGATION-MIB::ipsoLAPortIfIndex

description: A MemberInactive trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in an
agent role, has detected that a member port for one of the
link aggregation groups has moved from active state to inactive
state. This indicates that the system will no longer choose this
port when sending data out of the link aggregation group.

event.Summary: Link aggregation group member port $v3 is inactive because of $v4

description: The interface index of the link aggregation group in the
variables.name: NOKIA-IPSO-LINKAGGREGATION-MIB::ipsoLAGroupIfIndex

description: The interface index of the member port in the MIB-II interfaces table.
variables.name: NOKIA-IPSO-LINKAGGREGATION-MIB::ipsoLAPortIfIndex

description: The reason why this member port became inactive.
variables.name: NOKIA-IPSO-LINKAGGREGATION-MIB::ipsoLAPortInactiveReason
